get.description: Get all information about a specific location, including listing statuses

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id of the location

patch.description: Make changes to a location. Any blank parameter deletes an old value, any unspecified parameter does nothing

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The uberall unique id for the location you want to update

get.description: Get locations managed by the current API user. Some fields are omitted (such as paymentOptions and services). For a full list use the GET/api/locations/$id endpoint.

parameters.name: businessId
parameters.description: Only return locations in the business identified by businessId. Allowed multiple businessIds

parameters.name: businessIds
parameters.description: Returns all locations associated with multiple business ids

parameters.name: cities
parameters.description: Get locations in the requested cities

parameters.name: classification
parameters.description: Possible values: REQUIRED, BASIC, ADVANCED, BONUS and COMPLETE

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Get locations in the requested country

parameters.name: endDateMax
parameters.description: Only locations with an endDate less than or equal to endDateMax will be returned

parameters.name: endDateMin
parameters.description: Only locations with an endDate greater than or equal to endDateMin will be returned.

parameters.name: excludedLocationIds
parameters.description: List of locationIds that should be excluded from the result

parameters.name: facebookStatus
parameters.description: Possible values: CONNECTED, NOT_CONNECTED

parameters.name: fieldMask
parameters.description:
Possible fieldMask options ( 'id', 'name', 'identifier', 'street', 'streetNo', 'streetAndNumber', 'addressExtra', 'zip', 'city', 'country',
                                                               'dateCreated', 'endDate', 'province', 'lat', 'lng', 'addressDisplay', 'phone', 'fax', 'timeZone',
                                                               'cellphone', 'website', 'email', 'legalIdent', 'taxNumber', 'descriptionShort',
                                                               'descriptionLong', 'imprint', 'openingHoursNotes', 'status', 'photos', 'attributes',
                                                               'firstSyncStarted', 'lastUpdated', 'lastSyncStarted', 'autoSync', 'locationSyncable', 'businessId', 'businessName', 'productPlanName',
                                                               'googleInsights', 'labels', 'customFields', 'features', 'groups', 'openingHours', 'specialOpeningHours', 'nameDescriptor',
                                                               'actionsRequired', 'profileCompleteness', 'suggestionsForFieldsAvailable', 'listingsInSync', 'activeListingsCount',
                                                               'dataPoints', 'averageRating', 'directoriesMissingConnect' )

parameters.name: googleDirectoryStatus
parameters.description:
Possible values: VERIFIED (the Google listing is verified and fully managed by us),
                            UNVERIFIED (the Google listing is not verified),
                            DISABLED (the Google listing is disabled),
                            SUSPENDED (the Google listing is suspended),
                            DUPLICATE (the Google listing is a duplicate),
                            PENDING_VERIFICATION (a verification pin has been requested for the Google listing),
                            NEEDS_REVERIFICATION (the verification process for the Google listing needs to be reverified),
                            PENDING_REVIEW (there is no Google account connected for the listing)

parameters.name: googleStatus
parameters.description:
Possible values: VERIFIED (the Google listing is verified and fully managed by us),
                            VERIFICATION_STARTED (a verification pin has been requested for the Google listing),
                            VERIFICATION_NOT_STARTED (the verification process has not been start for the Google listing),
                            NOT_CONNECTED (there is no Google account connected for the listing),
                            VERIFIED_BY_THIRD_PARTY (there is a verified listing on Google but we do not manage it)

parameters.name: groupIds
parameters.description: The groupId to which the location belongs

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: The name of the group to which the location belongs

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Only return one location (per business) based on your internal identification system

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Only return locations that contain at least one of the given labels

parameters.name: locationIds
parameters.description: Only return locations identified by ids listed in locationIds

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Used for pagination. Maximum number of results per page. Default: 50 (Without a defined FieldMask the maximum number of results is 50.)

parameters.name: missingDirectoryField
parameters.description: Only return locations that have no value for the given field

parameters.name: needsReview
parameters.description: If set to true, only return locations with faulty data in need of review. Default: false.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset used for pagination. Default: 0

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: use asc for ascending sort or desc for descending sort

parameters.name: postcodes
parameters.description: Get locations in the requested post / zip codes

parameters.name: provinces
parameters.description: Get locations in the requested province / state

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Filter by name, zip, street, city, label

parameters.name: queryFields
parameters.description: The fields that will be searched to contain the value provided in the 'query' query parameter.

parameters.name: selectAll
parameters.description: Setting selectAll to true allows finding ALL locations for any given businessId, locationIds and labels. In other words these fields are OR joined.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
The location property to sort by (ascending unless order is specified).
                            One of name, street, streetNo, zip, city, phone, cellphone, fax, website, email, lastSyncStarted, country

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by locations status. One of ACTIVE, INACTIVE, CANCELLED

parameters.name: syncNeeded
parameters.description: If set to true, filter locations that have been updated but did not start a sync yet

parameters.name: syncStarted
parameters.description: If set to true, filter locations that started a sync. If set to false, filter locations that never synced

parameters.name: temporarilyClosed
parameters.description: Filter for locations that are currently set to temporarily closed (True) or are not temporarily closed (False)

openingHours.description:
The location''s opening hours: e.g. 
[ { 
    "dayOfWeek": 1,
    "closed": false,
    "from1": "08:00",
    "to1": "11:00"
  }, 
  {
    "dayOfWeek": 2,
    "closed": false,
    "from1": "08:00",
    "to1": "11:00",
    "from2": "13:00",
    "to2": "21:00"
  },
  {
    "dayOfWeek": 3,
    "closed": true
  }
]
Please note that having more than 2 time periods for each day is not possible.

syncStatus.description: The sync status of the listing. One of: IN_SYNC (location found on remote directory and in sync with reference data), NOT_IN_SYNC (location found on remote directory but differs from reference data), NOT_FOUND (location not found (yet) on remote directory), TECHNICAL_PROBLEMS (temporary problems when connecting with the directory),  NOT_SUPPORTED (if the location is incompatible with the directory or if we cannot search on that directory), NO_ONLINE_LISTING (for the types where there is no listing that can be checked online, e.g. GARMIN), LINK_ONLY (for the types where we can only link a listing by not update it)

id.description: Output only. The uberall unique id for the location

listings.description: Output only. List of this location''s online listings together with their sync status

openingHours.description:
The location''s opening hours: e.g. 
[ { 
    "dayOfWeek": 1,
    "closed": false,
    "from1": "08:00",
    "to1": "11:00"
  }, 
  {
    "dayOfWeek": 2,
    "closed": false,
    "from1": "08:00",
    "to1": "11:00",
    "from2": "13:00",
    "to2": "21:00"
  },
  {
    "dayOfWeek": 3,
    "closed": true
  }
]
Please note that having more than 2 time periods for each day is not possible.

specialOpeningHours.description:
The location''s special opening hours: e.g. 
[ {
"date": "2017-06-29",
"closed": true
},
{
"date": "2017-06-30",
"from1": "11:00",
"to1": "14:00",
"from2": 16:00",
"to2": "20:00"
}
]
Please note that having more than 2 time periods for each day is not possible.

streetType.description: Required for Spain. One of ALAMEDA, AVENIDA, CALLE, CAMINO, CARRER, CARRETERA, GLORIETA, KALEA, PASAJE, PASEO, PLACA, PLAZA, RAMBLA, RONDA, RUA, SECTOR, TRAVESERA, TRAVESIA, URBANIZACION

addressExtra.description: An address extra: e.g. building, floor...

zip.description: Zip code, optional only for some countries.

province.description: Province. Only send when not blank

lat.description: The latitude coordinate of the location

lng.description: The longitude coordinate of the location

addressDisplay.description: Indicates if the address should be displayed or hidden

phone.description: The location''s contact phone number, a valid phone number has to be provided.

website.description: A valid url for the location''s website (use UTMs to add tracking)

email.description: A contact email for the location

legalIdent.description: A legal identifier of the location. SIRET  number in France

taxNumber.description: The tax number of the location. CIF/NIF in Spain

descriptionShort.description:
A short description - up to 200 characters, all characters must match this regexp: 
[0-9\p'{'L'}'\(\)\[\] \?:;\/!\\,\.\-%\\&=\r\n\t_\*`"''\+@$]

descriptionLong.description:
A long description - up to 1000 characters, all characters must match this regexp: 
[0-9\p'{'L'}'\(\)\[\] \?:;\/!\\,\.\-%\\&=\r\n\t_\*`"''\+@\^$]

openingHoursNotes.description:
Additional info about opening hours: e.g. ''We never open on bank holidays'' - max. 255 characters, all characters must match this regexp: 
[0-9\p'{'L'}'\(\)\[\] \?:;\/!\\,\.\-%\\&\r\n\t_\*`"''\+@]
openingHoursNotes.example: We never open on bank holidays

brands.description: The brands offered by the location to its customers

items.description: The brands offered by the location to its customers

paymentOptions.description: The payment options accepted at the location (eg. cash, bank transfer, ...)

items.description: The payment options accepted at the location

languages.description: The language(s) in which customers can interact with the location''s staff

items.description: The language(s) in which customers can interact with the location's staff

categories.description: Required to start location sync  - A list of category IDs describing the location

status.description:
The status of the location. One of:
  • ACTIVE - will be synced and renewed
  • INACTIVE - will not be synced anymore, claims of listings will be released where possible
  • CANCELLED - will be synced, will not be renewed. Once endDate is reached, location will switch to INACTIVE
  • CLOSED - location has shut down, we''ll mark listings as permanently closed or remove listings from the internet where permanently closed status is not supported

lastSyncStarted.description: Output only. Date of the last sync for the location

identifier.description: The location identifier based on your internal identification system

dateCreated.description: Output only. The date and time the location was created in our database

lastUpdated.description: Output only. Date of the last changes made to the location. Includes updates by users, API, location cleansing, and duplicate checks

autoSync.description: When autosync is set to true, information changed for the location in Uberall will automatically be syncronized to all connected listings without the need to explicitly start a sync again after it''s been started once.

openingDate.description: The date the location will first open. Must be formatted YYYY-MM-DD

serviceAreas.description: Service areas available on the location.

callTrackingNumbers.description: Add call tracking numbers for distribution to Google, Facebook, and Bing. The call tracking numbers must be different from the location''s primary phone number

utms.description: UTM parameter to be appended to the location''s website. Codes can be sent to Google, Facebook, and Bing.

transactionLinks.description: Links that appear on some directories for specific types of customer actions, such as food ordering, appointment setting, and booking reservations. Only available for specific business categories.

features.description: Output only. List of features available to the location

nameDescriptor.description: An addition to the location''s name which gives specific info about the location''s address (e.g. Mall level 2 OR Inside Departures). Sent only to FACEBOOK

customFields.description:
A Map for identifying the value input for a specific custom field name on the location. Custom fields are created at the business level. 
  "customFields": [
    '{'
      "name": "foo",
      "value": "bar"
    '}',
    '{'
      "name": "baz",
      "value": "qux"
    '}'
  ]

services.description: Services offered at the location. Do not use if Content Collections is enabled. Instead use the Service Item and Collection endpoints

activeDirectoriesCount.description: Output only. Number of active directories

activeListingsCount.description: Output only. Number of active listings

businessId.description: ID of the business this location is linked to. Mandatory when creating a location. Sending a different ID than the current businessId when updating will lead to changing the business. This is only possible in case all connected accounts (Facebook, Google, ) are compatible.

cleansingComment.description:
Cleansing comment by user, set only when cleansingStatus is INVALID_DATA.
Possible Values (ADDRESS_DETAILS_VERIFIED, NAME_ADDRESS_DETAILS_UPDATED, NON_CLOSURE_CONFIRMATION,)

cleansingInvalidDataReason.description:
Output only. Invalid Cleansing Reason (eg. INCOMPLETE_ADDRESS,ADDRESS_ IS_PO_BOX,ADDRESS_ DOES_NOT_EXIST, LOCATION_IS_CLOSED, INFORMATION_IS_WRONG, LOCATION_IS_MOVED, NON_LATIN_CHARACTERS_ADDRESS, OTHER).
Guide on how to fix invalid data issues - http://ubr.al/fix_invalid_data

cleansingStatus.description: Output only. Current cleansing status for the location. Possible values: NOT_CLEANSED, PENDING, CLEANSED, INVALID_DATA

moreHours.description:
The location''s additional service hours, such as delivery, pickup, happy hours etc. Submitted to Google. e.g. 
[{
    "type": "ONLINE_SERVICE_HOURS",
    "hours": [{
        "dayOfWeek": 1,
        "from1": "09:00",
        "to1": "18:00"
    }, {
        "dayOfWeek": 2,
        "from1": "09:00",
        "to1": "13:00"
    }]
}, {
    "type": "ACCESS",
    "hours": [{
        "dayOfWeek": 1,
        "from1": "06:00",
        "to1": "20:00"
    }]
}]

emailSettings.description: A list of EmailSettings for this user. Only one EmailSettings object per EmailType possible.

featuresDetailed.description:
Map containing the feature names and corresponding feature-specific parameters. "featuresDetailed" is supported for the features LOCATION_WRITE and ADVANCED_ANALYTICS. For LOCATION_WRITE a list of fields that this user can update is expected. For ADVANCED_ANALYTICS a list of dashboards the user has access to is expected. For example: 
"featuresDetailed": '{'
'{'
   "featuresDetailed":'{'
      "LOCATION_WRITE":[
         "fax",
         "openingHours",
         "callTrackingNumbers",
         "streetNo",
         "openingHoursNotes",
         "specialOpeningHours",
         "street",
         "languages",
         "customFields",
         "contentLists",
         "photos",
         "services",
         "moreHours",
         "descriptionLong",
         "zip",
         "lat",
         "openingDate",
         "email",
         "addressDisplay",
         "labels",
         "taxNumber",
         "city",
         "cellphone",
         "contentCollections",
         "attributes",
         "categories",
         "imprint",
         "phone",
         "utms",
         "addressExtra",
         "keywords",
         "legalIdent",
         "lng",
         "paymentOptions",
         "descriptionShort",
         "socialProfiles",
         "identifier",
         "website",
         "country",
         "province",
         "name",
         "videos",
         "brands",
         "serviceAreas"
      ],
      "ADVANCED_ANALYTICS":[
         "overview",
         "listings-google",
         "customer-feedback"
      ]
   '}'
'}'

whitelabelInformationIdentifier.description:
Mandatory If there is more than one whitelabel for the sales partner</br>
Parameter not provided: If there is only one whitelabel for the sales partner we default to it</br>
Parameter not provided: If a child sales partner does not have whitelabels and the father has only one we default to the father whitelabel</br>

A Map with keys as missingConnection and missingPermission. missingConnection is a Map with list of all connections missing connection.
